AI Description: HISAT2 is a fast and sensitive alignment program for mapping next-generation sequencing reads (both DNA and RNA) against the general human population (as well as against a single reference genome). It builds on HISAT and Bowtie, allowing for significantly improved performance and new capabilities.
Core Features: Fast & Sensitive Alignment Of Ngs Reads, Mapping Of DNA & RNA Reads, Alignment Against General Human Population Or A Single Reference Genome, Improved Performance & New Capabilities Compared To Hisat & Bowtie
